# fitzpatrickSkinType()

**Instance Method**

Reads the user’s Fitzpatrick Skin Type from the HealthKit store.

## Declaration

```swift
func fitzpatrickSkinType() throws -> HKFitzpatrickSkinTypeObject
```

## Return Value

A skin type object representing the skin type selected by the user.

## Discussion

If the user has not yet specified a skin type, or if the user has denied your app permission to read the skin type, this method returns [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKFitzpatrickSkinType/notSet].



## Possible Values

- **HKFitzpatrickSkinTypeObject**: This class acts as a wrapper for the [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKFitzpatrickSkinType] enumeration.
- **HKFitzpatrickSkinType**: Categories representing the user’s skin type based on the Fitzpatrick scale.

## Reading characteristic data

- **biologicalSex()**: Reads someone’s biological sex from the HealthKit store.
- **bloodType()**: Reads the user’s blood type from the HealthKit store.
- **dateOfBirth()**: Reads the user’s date of birth from the HealthKit store as a date value.
- **dateOfBirthComponents()**: Reads the user’s date of birth from the HealthKit store as date components.
- **wheelchairUse()**: Reads the user’s wheelchair use from the HealthKit store.
